Articles.Content:
Hi my name is Cirdan,

I lost all of my 4 posts in the recent outage. I never actually properly introduced myself in this subforum, so hi. I have been lurking without an account since early .15, and with an account since well, October I suppose...

The first fersion that I played was the 0.13.3 demo, and I remember my first successful moon landing...

...on control surfaces

Still pretty new at rocketry but I have been able to get to duna and almost to eve (managed to break the parachutes ~1km away from the surface...)

Also have never built a successful plane...

P.S. how do you access the dev's livestreams?
